top_10_exploits.description: Attackers compromised 5/9 validator keys to approve fraudulent withdrawals
top_10_exploits.vulnerable_code_pattern: Multi-sig with low threshold + centralized validators
top_10_exploits.exploit_technique: Compromised private keys → signed fake withdrawal transactions

top_10_exploits.description: Called privileged function through cross-chain message
top_10_exploits.root_cause: Missing access control on cross-chain message handler
top_10_exploits.exploit_technique: Send malicious cross-chain message → call keeper contract → extract funds

top_10_exploits.description: Forged proof to mint BNB on BSC side
top_10_exploits.vulnerable_code_pattern: Insufficient proof verification in bridge contract
top_10_exploits.root_cause: Bug in IAVL proof verification allowed forged proofs
top_10_exploits.exploit_technique: Crafted fake proof → verified as valid → minted 2M BNB

top_10_exploits.description: Attacker bypassed signature verification in cross-chain message validation
top_10_exploits.root_cause: Missing sysvar account validation in Solana program
top_10_exploits.exploit_technique: Forged guardian signatures by exploiting missing account validation

top_10_exploits.description: Flash loan + donation to manipulate health factor calculation
top_10_exploits.root_cause: Donation function updated internal accounting without actual token transfer validation
top_10_exploits.exploit_technique: 1. Flash loan, 2. Donate to inflate collateral, 3. Borrow against fake collateral, 4. Liquidate self

top_10_exploits.description: Zero hash allowed as valid merkle root during upgrade
top_10_exploits.root_cause: Upgrade set trusted root to 0x0, allowing any message to validate
top_10_exploits.exploit_technique: Submit arbitrary messages with 0x0 merkle proof → passed validation

top_10_exploits.vulnerable_code_pattern: External call before state update in lending market
top_10_exploits.root_cause: Missing reentrancy guard on liquidation function
top_10_exploits.exploit_technique: Flash loan → deposit → reenter during callback → borrow → repay with less

top_10_exploits.description: Manipulated oracle price through low-liquidity perpetual markets

top_10_exploits.root_cause: Oracle price derived from thin liquidity perp market
top_10_exploits.exploit_technique: 1. Build large perp position, 2. Pump price with small capital, 3. Borrow against inflated collateral
